1. Login to the Application: [sourceinstance-clonesync] instance 2. Open Target group page 3. Select touchpoint: [SYNC Automation touchpoint 01] 4. Create new Target group 5. Sync created Target group with [targetinstance-clonesync] instance 6. Switch to [targetinstance-clonesync] instance 7. Check if Notification panel contains notification about successful Sync 8. Switch back to [sourceinstance-clonesync] instance 9. Open Target group page 10. Select touchpoint: [SYNC Automation touchpoint 01] 11. Search and open created Target group 12. Change name of opened Target group 13. Sync changed Target group with [targetinstance-clonesync] instance 14. Switch to [targetinstance-clonesync] instance 15. Check if Notification panel contains notification about successful Sync 16. Open Target group page 17. Select touchpoint: [SYNC Automation touchpoint 01] 18. Search and open changed Target group 19. Verify that changed Target group exists after Sync

case.title: [CH] Targeting rule: Add and Remove parametrized condition

custom.steps:
1. Login to the Application: [sourceinstance-clonesync] instance 2. Open Targeting rules page 3. Select touchpoint: [SYNC Automation touchpoint 01] 4. Create new Targeting rule 5. Sync created Targeting rule with [targetinstance-clonesync] instance 6. Switch to [targetinstance-clonesync] instance 7. Check if Notification panel contains notification about successful Sync
8. Switch back to [sourceinstance-clonesync] instance 9. Open Targeting rules page 10. Select touchpoint: [SYNC Automation touchpoint 01] 11. Search and open created Targeting rule 12. Add Parametrized Condition to opened Targeting rule 13. Sync changed Targeting rule with [targetinstance-clonesync] instance 14. Switch to [targetinstance-clonesync] instance 15. Check if Notification panel contains notification about successful Sync
16. Switch back to [sourceinstance-clonesync] instance 17. Open Target groups page 18. Select touchpoint: [SYNC Automation touchpoint 01] 19. Create new Target group with created Targeting rule
20. Open Messages page 21. Create new Message with included created Target group 22. Sync created Message with [targetinstance-clonesync] instance 23. Switch to [targetinstance-clonesync] instance 24. Check if Notification panel contains notification about successful Sync
25. Open Messages page 26. Select touchpoint: [SYNC Automation touchpoint 01] 27. Create new Message with included created Target group in [targetinstance-clonesync] instance
28. Switch back to [sourceinstance-clonesync] instance 29. Open Messages page 30. Select touchpoint: [SYNC Automation touchpoint 01] 31. Search and open first created Message in [sourceinstance-clonesync] instance 32. Remove included Target group from opened Message
33. Open Target group page 34. Search and open created Target group 35. Remove Targeting rule from opened Target group
36. Open Targeting rule page 37. Search and open created Targeting rule 38. Remove added Parametrized Condition from opened Targeting rule
39. Open Sync page 40. Generate changes list from [sourceinstance-clonesync] to [targetinstance-clonesync] 41. Verify that Message and all dependencies are blocked for Sync

1. Login to the Application: [sourceinstance-clonesync] instance 2. Open Targeting rules page 3. Select touchpoint: [SYNC Automation touchpoint 01] 4. Create new Targeting rule 5. Add new Condition to created Targeting rule 5. Sync created Targeting rule with [targetinstance-clonesync] instance 6. Switch to [targetinstance-clonesync] instance 7. Check if Notification panel contains notification about successful Sync 8. Switch back to [sourceinstance-clonesync] instance 9. Open Targeting rules page 10. Select touchpoint: [SYNC Automation touchpoint 01] 11. Search and open created Targeting rule 12. Change `single/multiple` slider in opened Targeting rule 13. Sync changed Targeting rule with [targetinstance-clonesync] instance 14. Switch to [targetinstance-clonesync] instance 15. Check if Notification panel contains notification about successful Sync 16. Switch back to [sourceinstance-clonesync] instance 17. Open Targeting rules page 18. Select touchpoint: [SYNC Automation touchpoint 01] 19. Search and open created Targeting rule 20. Change `all/at least one` slider in opened Targeting rule 21. Sync changed Targeting rule with [targetinstance-clonesync] instance 22. Switch to [targetinstance-clonesync] instance 23.
